title: People
text:
Dr. David Goretzko



d.goretzko@uu.nl

Google Scholar

University Homepage

Assistant Professor of Methodology and Statistics at Utrecht University

Short CV:

Since 2022: Assistant Professor “Methodology and Statistics” (Utrecht University)
2022: Habilitation (LMU Munich)
2022: Interim Professor “Psychological Methods” (Leipzig University)
2021 - 2022: Interim Professor “Computational Modeling in Psychology” (LMU Munich)
Since 2021: PI in Project funded by the German Research Foundation (DFG GO 3499/1-1)
2020: Ph.D. Psychological Methods (LMU Munich)
2018: M.Sc. Statistics (LMU Munich)
2016: M.Sc. Psychology (LMU Munich)
2015: B.Sc. Physics (LMU Munich)
2014: B.Sc. Psychology (LMU Munich)







Dr. Melanie Viola Partsch



m.v.partsch@uu.nl

Google Scholar

University Homepage

PostDoc in Methodology and Statistics at Utrecht University

Short CV:

Since 08/2023: Postdoctoral Researcher in DFG Project “Detection and Classification of Misspecifications in Structural Equation Modeling using Machine Learning” (DFG GO 3499/1-1, Utrecht University)
2023: PhD in Psychology (GESIS & RPTU Kaiserslautern-Landau)
03/2022-09/2022: Research Associate (University of Education Weingarten)
03/2017-12/2022: Research Associate (GESIS—Leibniz Institute for the Social Sciences)
2016: M.Sc. Psychology (University of Mannheim)
2013: B.Sc. Psychology (University of Ulm)







Dr. Philpp Sterner



philipp.sterner@ruhr-uni-bochum.de

Google Scholar

University Homepage

PostDoc and Statistician at the German Center for Mental Health (DZPG, Ruhr University Bochum)

Short CV:

2025 PhD in Psychological Methods (LMU Munich)
Since 2024: (Postdoctoral) Researcher and Statistician at the DZPG
Since 2022: Master Student “Statistics & Data Science” (LMU Munich)
2021 - 2024 Research Associate and Statistical Consultant for Graduate School POKAL (LMU Munich)
2021: M.Sc. Psychology (LMU Munich)
2017: B.Sc. Psychology (LMU Munich)
